definition: word/statement/speech/lyrics/CL:組|组[zu3],個|个[ge4]/a form of lyric poetry, flourishing in the Song dynasty 宋朝|宋朝[Song4 chao2]/CL:首[shou3]

sentences.english: Construct your own sentences using the words that you have noted in your dictionary.
sentences.chinese: 用你在个人词库中所写下的单词进行遣词造句。

sentences.english: They are not inventive and cannot "play" with language the way humans do.
sentences.chinese: 它们不像人工翻译那样具有创新性，能遣词造句。

sentences.english: I had corrected some vocabularies cause that made many people misunderstanding.
sentences.chinese: 会有人会错意，所以我重新修改用字遣词。

sentences.english: This article mainly discusses the style and diction with the special reference to the study and application of synonymity.
sentences.chinese: 本文主要讨论语体与遣词在同义性方面的运用。
的确，洪堡的遣词用字是无可指责的。

definition: antithesis (two lines of poetry matching in sense and sound)/to fight/to wage war
wording/way of expressing something/turn of phrase/diction
to express or convey one's ideas
writing style (formal)/to send an official written communication
level and oblique tones (technical term for Classical Chinese rhythmic poetry)
forms of versification/conventions regarding set number of words and lines, choice of tonal patterns and rhyme schemes for various types of Classical Chinese poetic composition/metrical verse
